title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
OB: When initiating a search via the Package view selection and dialog, the search dialog is pre-populated with the fully qualified name of the selected package. However, when searching for declarations, no results are found. It should be noted that searching via the context menu in the packages view does work as expected.
EB: When searching via the Package view selection and dialog, the search should first attempt to retrieve the Java element based on the fully qualified name. If that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
1. Open the package view.
2. Right-click on a package and select the 'Search' option from the context menu.
3. In the search dialog that appears, ensure that the fully qualified name of the package is pre-populated.
4. Select the 'Declarations' option from the search dialog.
5. Click on the 'Search' button.

Expected result: The search should retrieve the Java element based on the fully qualified name and display the relevant results. If the retrieval fails, the search results should display the element name instead.
